strength: The source of physical prowess. Provides strong Defense in addition to increasing Max Health, Health Regeneration, Max Damage and Min Damage.
dexterity: The source of proficiency. Increases quickness and critical attacks in addition to Evasion and Max Damage.
wisdom: The source of mental prowess. Increases Max Mana and Mana Regeneration in addition to cooldown abilities and Max Damage.
perception: The source of sense-related abilities. Heightens awarness during battle. Increases the accuracy of attacks, CC effects, enhances time boost abilities Max Damage and Min Damage.
